text: Ti Poniro Mou Zitas (Greek: Tι Πονηρό Μου Ζητάς) is the second studio album by Albanian-born Greek singer Eleni Foureira. The album was released in Greece and Cyprus on July 1 2012 by Minos-EMI S.A. ==Singles== Ti Poniro Mou Zitas includes "Reggaeton", which was released before the album. A further 5 singles were released: "To Party Den Stamata", "Sexy (Reggaeton)", "All I Need", "Stou Erota Tin Trela" and "To Party Den Stamata". ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2012) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Greek Albums (IFPI) | 7 |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Region ! Release Date ! Format ! Label !
